outline:
1. to hide, conceal
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to hide oneself
      2. to be hidden, be concealed
    2. (Piel) to hide carefully
    3. (Pual) to be hidden carefully, be concealed
    4. (Hiphil) to conceal, hide
    5. (Hithpael) to hide oneself carefully
kjv_def: be absent, keep close, conceal, hide (self), (keep) secret, [idiom] surely.
strongs_def: to hide (by covering), literally or figuratively
